code: import{createClient}from'@supabase/supabase-js';const supabaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL;const supabaseAnonKey=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY;if(!supabaseUrl||!supabaseAnonKey){throw new Error('Supabase environment variables are not set. Check your .env file and ensure you\'re using the REACT_APP_ prefix.');}export const supabase=createClient(supabaseUrl,supabaseAnonKey);
